name: Tranquil Lake
description:
Getting to the cabin for a weekend getaway usually proves itself to be the perfect way to relax. Arriving early before nightfall, some strange events may make the usual time for a well deserved rest just not the same as it always has been...

Game made as a part of the HPS1 Summer of Shivers 2021 game jam. Absolutely zero time went into polishing during the jam, but expect updates during the upcoming weeks...

We recommend downloading the game for full combability and to play the game at a steady pace as the game is dialogue heavy. 

Press ESC to quit the game.
